item.description:
Elizabeth M. Barreras is the head of Blue Kitabu, a nonprofit organization that focuses on sustainable educational development. They are building a school in Ghana, training teachers, and making them self-sufficient over the next three years. They are having a silent auction featuring knitted and crocheted goods (blankets, hats, scarves, etc) the first week of October to help fund this project and are looking for avid knitters/crocheters to participate!

If you are interested, or curious, join on Saturday June 6th at 2pm. The meeting will be held at 10 Bowdoin St. Boston MA 02114 in the 4th floor common room. You can learn more about the project and/or sign up to participate in our silent auction.

group.name: Greater Boston Jewelry Design and DIY Crafts Meetup Group

item.name: Calling all Knitters and Crocheters Interested in Helping a Worthy Cause ...
